summary:
Coffee is a popular hot drink made from roasted and ground beans. It has a bitter taste and a special chemical called caffeine that wakes you up. People often add sugar or milk to make it taste better.

Coffee comes from a plant, and its history starts near the Red Sea. It became popular in the Middle East and then spread to Europe. Now, it's grown in many countries near the equator. Brazil is the biggest producer. The global coffee business is huge, but many farmers face poverty. Some people also worry about its effect on the environment.
title: Coffee
